#summary Details how to install and run the game in OpenSuse.
#labels Phase-Support,Featured

= Installation =

The package form Packman is VERY WELL Formed.
Go here to get and install it : 

`http://packman.links2linux.org/package/openredalert/70182`

It's the packman page, you can install with one click.

After that you MUST get the 2 .mix files and copy it to the folder :

`/usr/share/games/openredalert/data/mix`

and not

`~/openredalert/data/mix`


= Details =

Mix files can be found from original CD here :

(English Version) : `http://www.ea.com/redalert/news-detail.jsp?id=62`

Or the demo file

(Demo File) : `ftp://ftp.westwood.com/pub/redalert/previews/demo/ra95demo.zip`
